name: ISIWIPLUS
0:
”Alexa, show the office camera.”
”Alexa, show my feed from the office camera.”
”Stop.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
By using this skill, you could send voice commands to control the cameras.

It's simple,just ask Alexa:
"Alexa, show the office camera."
"Alexa, show my feed from the office camera."
"Alexa, stop."
"Alexa, stop the office camera feed."
"Alexa, hide the office camera."
"Alexa, go home."

Our skill requires an account link. Click the enable button to log in to your Amazon account. Make sure that this account and the account bound to the device are the same account. After successful login, click the allow button and then click Finish to use the skill.

This skill support ISIWI camera.
